name: Pacman In Space!
description:
My remake of my 2D shooter game, now known as Pacman In Space! Modifications I've made:

1.) Replaced menu music as well as level music and sound effects

2.) Replaced all sprites (alien, player), and recolored menus

3.) Added 2 more levels

Credits: Brian Winn, Toru Iwatani (creator of pacman) 

Created by Camryn Drake
